Children and rights in Ireland

This document gives information on a child's rights in different areas, such as, education, employment, travel, recreation, health and relationships

The Ombudsman for Children
An tOmbudsman do Leanaí
The Ombudsman for Children promotes the rights and welfare of children in Ireland
Cuireann an tOmbudsman do Leanaí cearta agus leas leanaí chun cinn
The Office of the Ombudsman also investigates complaints regarding children's rights
Imscrúdaíonn sé/sí gearáin chomh maith. leanaí cearta leanaí
UN Convention on the Rights of the Child
Coinbhinsiún na NA um Chearta an Linbh
The UN Convention on the Rights of the Child sets out the basic human rights to which children are entitled
Leagtar amach i gCoinbhinsiún na NA um Cearta an Linbh na cearta bunúsacha atá leanaí i dteideal a fháil
National policy on children and young people
An Straitéis Náisiúnta Leanaí
This document gives information on national policy on children and young people in Ireland and their participation in decision-making
Is treoirphlean í chur feabhas a chur ar shaol na leanaí, agur ar shaol na leanaí faoi mhíbhuntáiste ach go háirithe
Causes of youth homelessness, also arrangements for young people who are homeless or at risk of losing their home
Cúiseanna le heaspa dídine na n-óg, agus socruithe do dhaoine óga atá gan dídean nó atá i mbaol a dteach a chailleadh

Children and the criminal justice system
Leanaí agus an córas ceartais choiriúil
The Children Act 2001 regulates the treatment of children found in breach of the criminal law
Rialaíonn Acht na Leanaí 2001 conas a dhéileáiltear le leanaí a sháraíonn an dlí coiriúil
This document is in: Justice > Children and young offenders
This document is in: Dlí > Gasúir agus Ógchiontóirí
The Criminal Justice Act 2006 introduced provisions for dealing with anti-social behaviour by children
Thug an tAcht um Cheartas Coiriúil forálacha isteach chun déileáil le hiompar frithshóisialta déanta ag leanaí
These provisions allow the Gardaí to deal with anti-social behaviour in a number of ways
Cuireann na forálacha sin ar chumas na nGardaí déileáil le hiompar frithshóisialta ar roinnt bealaí éagsúla
This document is in: Justice > Children and young offenders

Diversion activities and programmes for young offenders
Gníomhaíochtaí athstiúrtha agus cláir d'ógchiontóirí
